item.title: Project
item.description: Project 깃허브 업데이트 모니터링 시스템 개발 발주처: 코박(cobak.co.kr) 역할: Python 개발 기간: 2018.02 ~ 2018.02 참여인원: 1명 내용 등록된 Github 저장소들의 코드 수정 여부를 모니터링 하는 시스템. Crontab과 Github API등을 이용해서 정해진 시간마다 Github 저장소들의 정보를 읽어와서 DB에 저장. 웹을 통해서 Github 저장소들을 관리할 수 있도록 Django Admin과 연동하고 Command 추가. 역할: 개발 전부문 트위터 이벤트 랜딩페이지 개발 발주처: TheDream 참여인원: 1명 기간: 2015.01 ~ 2015.

item.title: Publications & Patents
item.description: Publications & Patents By First Author (Under Review) Uncertain Graph Analysis System, 2020 “Pre-select static caching and neighborhood ordering for bfs-like algorithms on disk-based graph engines”, Eunjae Lee, Junghyn Kim, Keunhak Lim, Sam H. Noh, Jiwon Seo, USENIX Annual Technical Conference (ATC), 2019 “SSD caching to overcome small write problem of disk-based RAID in enterprise environments”, Eunjae Lee, Yongseok Oh, and Donghee Lee, The 30th ACM/SIGAPP Symposium On Applied Computing (SAC), 2015 “LeavO Cache: SSD cache overcomming small write problem of RAID by keeping old data”, Eunjae Lee, Yongseok Oh, Jongmoo Choi, Donghee Lee, and Sam H.

item.title: Profile
item.description: Profile Eunjae Lee (이은재) Software Developer / Computer Science Researcher UNIST Ph.D candidate Email: kckjn97@gmail.com Github: github.com/kckjn97 Publication & Patent Research Interests Graph processing system Storage Distributed system Web development Technical Skills C/C++ PThread Linux Libaio Boost.Asio OpenCL Python Django Java Hadoop Linux Kernel Device-Mapper Software RAID NVMe Driver VFS ETC Git Docker Education Ph.
